title.rendered: Join us for Kid’s Corner Tomorrow, September 11th at 10:30 a.m. in BYRON

content.rendered: We are honored to welcome Army veteran and police officer Steve Glidden as our guest reader for Kid’s Corner tomorrow. We will be learning what it means to be an American Hero and honoring those who have sacrificed for our freedom. There will be book readings, activities, snacks and lots of fun!
